sentences: Ei jõudnud keegi nohki ütelda, kui vanamees pikali prantsatas.
Enne kui keegi nohki jõudis öelda, krapsas ta kui varblane korbitüki Kannelpulga Jaani näppude vahelt.
Ta ütles midagi enne, kui keegi jõudis reageerida.
context: "Ütelda" is an Estonian verb that means to say or tell something. It's used when someone speaks very quickly before others have a chance to react or respond. The word implies doing something hastily or rushing to speak. In the example sentences, it shows how someone might say something before another person can respond, or how someone acts quickly before anyone has time to say anything.
